\def\distdef#1{for \ctx\ $\SSPT{\S}{(\XV,\X)}$,
  $$\D = \{\emptyset \subset \DD \subseteq \SQP \mid \forall\ \DDD, \DDD' \in \DD, \forall\ \XX \in \X, \PRSQ{\DDD}{\JASN{\ASN\XV\XX}} = \PRSQ{\DDD'}{\JASN{\ASN\XV\XX}}\}$$
  that is, the set of all \dist{}s, where ``$\DD$'' denotes an abitrary such \dist, and ``$\DDD$'' denotes an arbitrary \seq\ in $\DD$#1%
}
